com.camerontec.util.io.socket

Class SocketChannelReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.io.socket.SocketChannelReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectableChannelReference

    public class SocketChannelReference
extends Object
implements SelectableChannelReference
    Class capable of containing a reference to a SocketChannel.

    This class is useful for exposing the various facets of a SocketChannel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Return the referent socket channel.
